QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT t.payer_plan_period_id , t.person_id , t.payer_plan_period_start_date , t.payer_plan_period_end_date , t.payer_concept_id , t.payer_source_value , t.payer_source_concept_id , t.plan_concept_id , t.plan_source_value , t.plan_source_concept_id , t.sponsor_concept_id , t.sponsor_source_value , t.sponsor_source_concept_id , t.family_source_value , t.stop_reason_concept_id , t.stop_reason_source_value , t.stop_reason_source_concept_id , ch.PartitionId FROM {sc}.payer_plan_period t JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID order by ch.PartitionId, t.person_id
